Text: I'll download this and give feedback for other users. I know a lot of people want this movie.

Review: The image quality is rather good, although my knowledge of these things are limited, I would say this is excellent compared to other movies that just look horrible. The sound is clear too, so well done. However, it's run time is 1hour 56 minutes, when its suppose to be 2hours and 10 mins minus the credits. So guys, to let you know some parts have been cut. TBH Im only watching it because im impatient, I will eventually go to the theatres anyway and watch it in full. Overall, very good. Downloaded quite fast aswell, I'll seed for a while :)

@RileyFinn-Thanks for the info
@ExtraTorrentRG-Thanks for the continued torrent support.
Thanx Riley, good honest review. Appreciated very much.

I don't know why everyone's complaining about the length being only 1:56/1:58; of the versions I've downloaded, the only things missing at that length are the recap before the WB logo flythrough and the end credits, so NBD. I was at the midnight showing, and I haven't noticed any scenes missing, even with all the supposed "cuts". If it's really bugging you, then go see it in the theaters. If not, then this should tide you over until the DVD comes out. Happy watching!

it's watchable, the sound is ok, looks like the same copy as the 1.4 gb file, there are a few cuts in it but it looks like they had audio sync problems that were edited out hence the cuts, overall if you really like the series and want quality then wait but if you just want to see the flick and don't have a gf or kids to take to the cinema then this is for you!!
@calicojax that's the length of the movie, it's only 2:10 including credits, trust me i was at the first showing in my city. :p

Also, of any copies ive son on TPB there is some cuts, but its little things like when they say to the goblin how are you, and he says im alive, the im alive isn't in the copies ive seen, all in all its like 2-4 minutes cut out, if you have OCD like me, wait. :P if not, trust me its not 10 minutes cut, 5 at most, i saw it in theatres
